DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and immunogenicity of the 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine (13vPnC) in infants of Japanese descent.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Japanese Infants
DOC.criteria: Healthy 2 to 6 monthold infant Available for entire study period Previous vaccination with licensed or investigational pneumococcal vaccine. Previous anaphylactic reaction to any vaccine or vaccinerelated component. Contraindication to vaccination with a pneumococcal conjugate vaccine. Bleeding diathesis or condition associated with prolonged bleeding time that would contraindicate any type of injection. Known or suspected immune deficiency or suppression.
